PersonalInfo.fullNameInstructions: Please enter your full legal name as shown on a government-issued ID

EmploymentHistory.addAnotherEmploymentAlert: Add Another Employment functionality not implemented yet

Skills.workedAsCleaner: Have you ever worked as a cleaner before?
Skills.operatedOrTrained: Have you ever operated or had training on any of the following?

ApplicantQuestions.previousEmployment: Have you ever been employed by Busy Bee? If yes, when?
ApplicantQuestions.attendancePunctuality: Working this job requires you to have excellent attendance and punctuality. Are you able to meet the requirements of this position?
ApplicantQuestions.eligibleForEmployment: Are you legally eligible for employment in the United States?
ApplicantQuestions.availableStartDate: If hired, on what date will you be available to start work?
ApplicantQuestions.anotherJob: Do you have another job? If yes, what company?
ApplicantQuestions.flexibleSchedule: This job may require you to have a flexible schedule. Can you meet this requirement?
ApplicantQuestions.availableForHolidays: Are you available to work holidays?
ApplicantQuestions.validDriversLicense: If your position requires operating a motor vehicle, do you have a valid driver's license?
ApplicantQuestions.criminalRecord: Have you ever been convicted of a crime or received a verdict of anything other than 'not guilty' in any criminal investigation or proceeding? If yes, describe when the conviction occurred, the facts and circumstances, and any facts pertaining to rehabilitation.

ApplicantHome.equalOpportunity: Busy Bee is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, genetic information, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. You may view our Equal Employment Opportunity notice here. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state and local law. We may use your information to maintain the safety and security of Busy Bee, its employees, and others as required or permitted by law. You may view Busy Bee Pay Transparency Policy, Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law notice, and Notice to Applicants for Employment and Employees by clicking on their corresponding links. Additionally, Busy Bee participates in the E-Verify program in certain locations, as required by law.
ApplicantHome.accommodations: Busy Bee is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at accommodations@busybee2000.com.
